text:
Kicking off 2021 stronger than ever, President Wayne J. Riley and Downstate's #frontline #heroes begin receiving second dose of @US_FDA-approved #COVID19 #vaccine.

With every #vaccination, we're closer to defeating #coronavirus!

#DownstateSTRONG #VaccinesWork #VaccinesSaveLives https://t.co/nkwn2rRS2g
